languages.text: "Прием получился не хуже, чем на звездах! Правда же?"

traits.locale_text: "Прием получился не хуже, чем на звездах! Правда же?"

languages.text: "This reception is as splendid as any among the stars! Don't you think?"
languages.original_text: "Прием получился не хуже, чем на звездах! Правда же?"

traits.locale_text: "This reception is as splendid as among the stars! Isn't it?"
"This reception is as splendid as among the stars! Isn't it?"
"This reception is as splendid as any among the stars! Don't you think?"
"This reception is as splendid as any among the stars! Don't you think?"

languages.text: 「このもてなし、星々のどれにも負けないほど豪華だ！そうは思わないのか？」
languages.original_text: "This reception is as splendid as any among the stars! Don't you think?"

traits.locale_text: 「このもてなし、星々のどれにも負けないほど豪華だ！そうは思わないのか？」

languages.text: «¡Esta recepción es tan espléndida como la de cualquier estrella! ¿No le parece?».
languages.original_text: "This reception is as splendid as any among the stars! Don't you think?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Esta recepción es tan espléndida como la de cualquier estrella! ¿No le parece?».

languages.text: “这场招待会哪怕是和群星之间的盛会相比，也毫不逊色！你也是这么觉得的吧？”
languages.original_text: "This reception is as splendid as any among the stars! Don't you think?"

traits.locale_text: “这场招待会哪怕是和群星之间的盛会相比，也毫不逊色！你也是这么觉得的吧？”

languages.text: "Dieser Empfang ist grandios wie alles unter den Sternen! Findet Ihr nicht?"
languages.original_text: "This reception is as splendid as any among the stars! Don't you think?"

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Empfang ist grandios wie alles unter den Sternen! Findet Ihr nicht?"

languages.text: « On a rarement vu plus belle réception ! Vous n'êtes pas d'accord ? »
languages.original_text: "This reception is as splendid as any among the stars! Don't you think?"

traits.locale_text: « On a rarement vu plus belle réception ! Vous n'êtes pas d'accord ? »

languages.text: "Bu merasim, yıldızlar arasındaki tüm merasimler kadar görkemli! Öyle değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "This reception is as splendid as any among the stars! Don't you think?"

traits.locale_text: "Bu merasim, yıldızlar arasındaki tüm merasimler kadar görkemli! Öyle değil mi?"
